utterances.utterance: Will she do it?

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Yes, yes, yes.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.utterance: (INAUDIBLE) his back.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: So, I'm going to get down?

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.utterance: Just get -- yes.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: All right.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Oh, this is going to stay online for a while.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.utterance: Ready? Ready? Stay. Wait, wait, Wait, wait Whidbey. Over, up.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Dana Perino.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Animals are so great. Can you get (INAUDIBLE).

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.utterance: There you go.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: He's so cute.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.utterance: Good boy.

utterances.speaker: PAVLICH
utterances.utterance: That was awesome.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Greg, your turn.

utterances.speaker: PAVLICH
utterances.utterance: Greg, you're next.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: That was great.

utterances.speaker: UNIDENTIFIED FEMALE
utterances.utterance: Good job.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Next job, I may be on "FOX AND FRIENDS."

utterances.speaker: PAVLICH
utterances.utterance: All right, "ONE MORE THING" up next.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: "ONE MORE THING," let's go in.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: It's time now for "ONE MORE THING." Jesse.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: It's time for Jesse's Feeding Frenzy, everybody.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Yes.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Let's hope you're hungry.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: We are.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Today is National Fried Chicken Day. That's right, National Fried Chicken Day. And now we have some chicken from Maria's dad's restaurant. Maria is a producer on the show. Palace Restaurant in Manhattan. And apparently, you can make fried chicken three different ways, this is breaking news, pan-frying, deep-frying, or pressure frying. I don't know what this is, but I'm just going to try it right here. Is this a thigh or a breast? Greg?

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: I'm not going to answer that. I'll have the drumstick.

utterances.speaker: PAVLICH
utterances.utterance: That looks like a thigh. It's a thigh.

utterances.speaker: WATTERS

utterances.utterance: This is my favorite food.

utterances.speaker: PERINO
utterances.utterance: Well, I'm -- I just have lipstick on.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: Dana?

utterances.speaker: WATTERS
utterances.utterance: Also, speaking of hungry, I got an appetite for "TUCKER CARLSON TONIGHT" at 8:00. I'll be there to talk about my new book.

utterances.speaker: GUTFELD
utterances.utterance: There you go.

utterances.utterance: OK, so, speaking of feeding frenzy, I have your next one. So, I want you to see this. Check out the way this guy dunks his cookie in the milk by doing a flip. This is Shaquan Parson. He's the man behind this impressive trick. He dips it in there and does the trick, and lands it, nails it. Also, I want to wish a very Happy Birthday to President George W. Bush, 75- years-old today. So, happy birthday to you, Mr. President.

utterances.utterance: Happy Birthday.

utterances.speaker: RIVERA

utterances.speaker: PAVLICH

utterances.speaker: RIVERA
utterances.utterance: Oh, OK.

utterances.utterance: All right, it is boiling hot out here. And how do I want to be this guy? Check him out right there. He knows how to be cool. That's what they call a raccoon. And I would pay good money to be him right now, stripped-down, just lie on that thing for hours. Does that feel good?

utterances.utterance: Yes. And I think you are modern not postmodern.
